item.title: Twinkle Khanna opens up on people comparing her son and daughter's different skin colours: I decided I'm - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Twinkle Khanna opens up on people comparing her son and daughter's different skin colours: I decided I'm going to make sure she believes she is wonderful

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

In a recent discussion, actress-turned-author Twinkle Khanna shared her parenting experiences regarding societal stereotypes about skin color affecting her children.

  • Khanna explained how her daughter Nitara faced comparisons with her brother Aarav regarding their skin color.
  • She emphasizes the importance of ensuring her daughter feels wonderful and confident about her appearance.
  • Twinkle recounted an empowering moment for Nitara when she proudly stated that her skin is greater than her brother's.
"If she has a unibrow, I told her that look you are as beautiful as Frida Kahlo."

The family is currently on vacation together celebrating the New Year.

Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh celebrated their daughter Dua's first Christmas with love and joy. The couple decorated a Christmas tree with ornaments bearing their names alongside Dua's, following a similar tradition established by Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt.

  • Deepika and Ranveer welcomed their daughter Dua Padukone Singh in September.
  • They celebrated Dua's first Christmas with a beautifully decorated tree.
  • Deepika shared their celebration on social media, expressing her gratitude and love.
  • Their celebration reminded followers of Ranbir and Alia's Christmas traditions with their daughter Raha.
  • The couple also requested privacy regarding their daughter from the paparazzi.

Deepika and Ranveer‚Äôs heartfelt celebration shows the beautiful traditions that new parents share during the festive season, drawing parallels with their contemporaries Ranbir and Alia.

item.description:
Shruti Haasan opens up on life after her parents Kamal Haasan and Sarika got separated: 'They were the most beautiful couple'

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Shruti Haasan discusses the impact of her parents' separation on her life, emphasizing the importance of independence for women.

  • Shruti reflects on her parents' beautiful relationship during their time together.
  • The actress shares personal lessons learned from her parents' split regarding financial and personal independence.
  • Shruti advocates for celebrating women's independence and acknowledges the lack of recognition for their struggles.
‚ÄúWhen my parents split up, everything changed... it taught me an important lesson on why it is important for a woman to be independent.‚Äù

This interview highlights Shruti's journey and the invaluable lessons she learned from her family's experiences, promoting women's independence.

item.title: M.T. Vasudevan Nair bids adieu: Life, works, and honours - The Hindu
item.description:
M.T. Vasudevan Nair bids adieu: Life, works, and honours

Published on: December 26, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

M.T. Vasudevan Nair, a Jnanpith Award winner, known for elevating Malayalam storytelling, passed away on December 25, 2024, at the age of 91. He had been hospitalized due to heart failure and suffered from various health issues.

  • MT is celebrated for his profound storytelling and exploration of human emotions.
  • He made significant contributions to Malayalam literature and cinema.
  • His works reflect the complexities of rural life and culture.
‚ÄúHis storytelling explored human emotions and the complexities of rural life.‚Äù

His death marks the end of an era in Malayalam literature and cinema, leaving behind a rich legacy.

item.title: 'Whole' Telugu film industry to meet Telangana govt in crucial meet to ease 'soured' ties following Allu Arjun arrest - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Telugu Film Industry to Meet Telangana Government to Resolve Tensions After Allu Arjun's Arrest

Date: Dec 26, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

The Telangana government and Telugu film representatives are set to meet to address tensions following the arrest of actor Allu Arjun linked to a tragic stampede.

  • A meeting is planned to improve relations between the Telangana government and the film industry.
  • Allu Arjun was arrested in connection with a stampede resulting in a woman's death during the screening of his film, Pushpa 2.
  • The state government may adjust ticket prices based on film categories.
  • High-budget films could be significantly impacted by the new government policies.
  • There is a political controversy surrounding Allu Arjun's comments and the government's response.
"If implemented properly, the minister‚Äôs statement will have a huge impact on high-budget films..."

This meeting marks a critical attempt to mend the relationship between the film industry and the government, following serious incidents that have sparked public and political outcry.

item.title: Malaika Arora Breaks Silence On Arjun Kapoor's 'I Am Single' Comment: 'I Will Never Choose...' - News18
item.description:
Malaika Arora Responds to Arjun Kapoor's 'I Am Single' Statement

Date: December 26, 2024

Source: News18

Malaika Arora addressed Arjun Kapoor's recent comment about their breakup, clarifying her stance on public discussions of personal matters.

  • Malaika emphasized her desire for privacy regarding her personal life.
  • Arjun Kapoor had previously announced he is single during a promotional event.
  • Despite their breakup, Malaika shared that they respect each other's privacy.
  • Malaika has been sharing cryptic messages on social media following the announcement.
Malaika said, ‚ÄúI will never choose a public platform to talk about my personal life. So, whatever Arjun has said is entirely his prerogative.‚Äù

The confirmation of their split comes after months of speculation, with both deciding to maintain their boundaries regarding public discussions.

item.title: Malaika Arora breaks silence on ex-boyfriend Arjun Kapoor‚Äôs ‚ÄòI‚Äôm single‚Äô remark: ‚ÄòIt‚Äôs his prerogative‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Malaika Arora Responds to Arjun Kapoor's 'I'm Single' Comment

Published on: 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

Malaika Arora addresses her ex-boyfriend Arjun Kapoor's recent public declaration of being single, emphasizing her desire for privacy in her personal life.

  • Malaika and Arjun dated for several years before their reported breakup earlier in 2024.
  • Arjun confirmed he is single at a public event, prompting Malaika's response.
  • Malaika stated, "I will never choose a public platform to talk about my personal life".
  • Rumors of their split had persisted, especially after they deleted photos together from social media.
  • Arjun supported Malaika after her stepfather's passing earlier this year.
‚ÄúI will never choose a public platform to talk about my personal life. So, whatever Arjun has said is entirely his prerogative.‚Äù - Malaika Arora

In conclusion, both individuals seem to be navigating their breakup privately, with Arjun‚Äôs candid admission juxtaposed against Malaika‚Äôs desire for discretion.

item.title: 'Baby Driver' actor Hudson Meek dies at 16 after tragic fall - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Baby Driver' Actor Hudson Meek Dies at 16 After Tragic Fall

Publication Date: December 21, 2023 - Source: Times of India

Hudson Meek, well-known for his role as Young Baby in 'Baby Driver', tragically passed away at the age of 16 following a fall from a moving vehicle.

  • Meek died at UAB Hospital in Alabama.
  • He was pronounced dead around 8 PM after suffering serious injuries.
  • His family expressed their sorrow in an Instagram post, highlighting his short but impactful life.
  • The J Pervis Talent Agency praised his extraordinary talent and the void his passing has created.
‚ÄúOur hearts are broken to share that Hudson Meek went home to be with Jesus tonight.‚Äù

Despite a brief career, Meek's performances earned him a following, and he is remembered fondly by his family and friends.

item.title: MT Vasudevan Nair: Celebrated Indian author dies at 91 - BBC.com
item.description:
MT Vasudevan Nair: Celebrated Indian Author Dies at 91

Publication Date: December 2023 | Source: Outlook India

MT Vasudevan Nair, a legendary writer from Kerala, has passed away at the age of 91 after being admitted to a hospital for breathing difficulties. Nair was not only a celebrated author but also an acclaimed film director and screenwriter.

  • Nair was born in 1933 in Palakkad, Kerala, and began writing from a young age despite minimal encouragement in his family.
  • He achieved significant recognition with his novel Naalukettu, which won one of Kerala's highest literary honours in 1959.
  • His retelling of the Mahabharata in Randamoozham is regarded as a classic of Indian literature.
  • Nair was awarded India's highest literary honour, the Jnanpith, among other accolades during his career.
  • He also had a prolific career in Malayalam cinema, noted for his screenplay in Oru Vadakkan Veeragatha.
  • Tributes have poured in highlighting his impact on Malayalam literature and cinema.
"You can change the dialogues of any other films, but not MT's, since those dialogues are essential to understand the essence of what is being conveyed." - Mohanlal

Nair's legacy lives on through his extensive body of work, influencing future generations of writers and filmmakers in India.

item.title: Guntur Kaaram special shows ‚Äì Tickets sold out in seconds - 123telugu
item.description:
Guntur Kaaram special shows ‚Äì Tickets sold out in seconds

Published on Dec 26, 2024 | Source: 123telugu.com

Superstar Mahesh Babu‚Äôs "Guntur Kaaram" was released on January 12, 2024, with high expectations. While his performance impressed viewers, the film did not fully meet fans' expectations, receiving mixed reviews. Now, the movie is back in the spotlight with a limited re-release in Hyderabad, where five special shows have been planned for the last day of 2024. Four shows are already sold out, demonstrating the film's growing popularity.

  • The movie stars Sreeleela, Meenakshi Chaudhary, Prakash Raj, Ramya Krishnan, and Rao Ramesh.
  • Produced by Haarika & Hassine Creations, featuring music by Thaman.
  • Fans are eagerly anticipating the re-release in theaters, showcasing a strong fan base.
‚ÄúThis demonstrates the strong fan base for Mahesh Babu and the film‚Äôs growing popularity.‚Äù

The limited re-release of "Guntur Kaaram" indicates its enduring appeal and the excitement among fans, especially after receiving a decent response on OTT platforms.

item.title: Baby John box office collection Day 1: Varun Dhawan starrer fails to beat Allu Arjun's 'Pushpa 2' at tick - TOI Etimes
item.description:

Publication Date: December 25, 2023

Source: Times of India

Varun Dhawan's new film 'Baby John' struggled at the box office on its opening day, failing to outperform the competition from 'Pushpa 2'.

  • 'Baby John' was released on Christmas Day, a strategic date for box office success.
  • The film's opening collections were significantly lower than those of 'Pushpa 2'.
  • Analysts note that 'Pushpa 2' continues to dominate in ticket sales and audience reception.
"Despite high expectations, 'Baby John' did not manage to capture the audience's interest like 'Pushpa 2' did."

The competition between the two films highlights the evolving dynamics of the box office during the festive season, which is crucial for major releases.

item.title: Dhirubhai Ambani International school fee structure: Here's how much Shah Rukh Khan, Aishwarya and other cele - India.com
item.description:
How Much Do Celebrities Pay for Their Kids' Tuition at Dhirubhai Ambani International School?

Date: December 21, 2024

Source: India.com

India is home to prestigious schools known for their quality education. Dhirubhai Ambani International School (DAIS) is prominently attended by many celebrity children. This report outlines the tuition fee structure for this elite institution.

  • DAIS is located in Mumbai and was established in 2003.
  • The school offers programs under the Indian Certificate of Secondary Education and the International Baccalaureate.
  • Tuition fees range from approximately Rs 1.4 million for kindergarten to Rs 2 million for Grade 12.
  • Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan reportedly pay Rs 4.5 lakh monthly for their daughter Aaradhya's education.
  • The fee structure varies: Rs 1.7 lakh annually for Class 1-7, Rs 5.9 lakh for Classes 8-10, and Rs 9.65 lakh for Classes 11-12.
"Dare to Dream‚Ä¶ Learn to Excel" is the motto of DAIS, focusing on holistic development and learning.

DAIS represents a significant choice for many celebrity families, reflecting the costs associated with high-quality education in India.

item.title: Horoscope Today, December 26, 2024: Check here Astrological prediction for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Daily Horoscope: Find out Astrological Prediction for December 26 2024

Published On: Dec 26, 2024

Source: India Today

Explore your daily horoscope for insights into love, health, money, and career across all zodiac signs. This article provides personalized predictions for Aries, Taurus, Gemini, and more.

  • Aries: Expect a surge in business and strong support from colleagues.
  • Taurus: Diligence and hard work will lead to smooth financial efforts.
  • Gemini: Enjoy harmonious relationships and potential travel opportunities.
  • Cancer: Family harmony and personal interests will take precedence.
  • Leo: Travel for business may be on the horizon; maintain strong connections.
  • Virgo: Family joy and successful relationships are highlighted.
  • Libra: Emphasize creativity and values to strengthen relationships.
  • Scorpio: Ensure order in your personal and professional life.
  • Sagittarius: Financial planning and achievements will see improvements.
  • Capricorn: Joyful times and professional support are expected.
  • Aquarius: Positivity surrounds your endeavors with opportunities for profit.
  • Pisces: Maintain humility and focus on health for a productive day.
